subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Build a new stadium dedicated to David Dinkins, the best New York friend the tournament has ever had and whose name is attached to a measly circle outside the tennis center.
snippet: Build a new stadium dedicated to David Dinkins, the best New York friend the tournament has ever had and whose name is attached to a measly circle outside the tennis center.
